m_szDocTitle: Tesla (TSLA) Stock Rallying Today Following Positive Deutsche Bank Note - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Tesla (TSLA) Stock Rallying Today Following Positive Deutsche Bank Note By Kurumi Fukushima | 04/22/15 - 09:33 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Shares of Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) are rallying, higher by 1.45% to $212.44 in early market trading Wednesday, after analysts at Deutsche Bank issued a positive note on the electric car maker. The firm said energy storage represents a "significant" opportunity for Tesla, while maintaining its "buy" rating with a price target of $245. On April 30, the company is expected to announce the launch of its new battery storage syste
